analysis.key_quote: This rule is an unlawful attempt to circumvent Congressionally established protections. It contravenes statutory civil service guarantees, ignores binding judicial precedent, and opens the door to politicization of federal employment.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting its violations of statutory protections and due process rights, emphasizing concerns about politicization and the undermining of the merit-based system.
